2014280.description:
"Lethalicia Stories" is a command battle-style role-playing game.

The RPG released by Project Candidates is now available on Steam!

You become the main character Jack, running around the field and being robbed.

The purpose of the journey is to retrieve the royal family's holy sword.

ğŸ”³Meeting friends to share your adventure with

You can bring up to 3 companions to accompany you on your adventures.

ğŸ”³Adventure stage Set in Lesalisia, which exists on the continent of Faneia. The world is created with a fusion of retro dots and 3D.

Compatible with immediate-X input processors only.

The following keyboards are also supported.
